file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-64-03-04 - APU FADEC - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU FADEC - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the FADEC. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-64-03-000-801-A FADEC - REMOVAL T-62T-40C14 AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-64-03-400-801-A FADEC - INSTALLATION T-62T-40C14 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-64-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-64-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 2. FADEC - REMOVAL A. General (1) Obey the instructions that follow to remove the FADEC. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to the rear electronic compart- Ladder 1 available ment F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the “APU Control” circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put the ladder in position, and open the rear electronic compartment access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-64-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the FADEC electrical connectors (1). (2) Remove the screw (3) and washers (4). (3) Remove the FADEC (2) from the rack. (a) Install caps and plugs to the disconnected points. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-64-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 FADEC - Removal/Installation Figure 401 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-64-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-64-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 3. FADEC - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey the instructions that follow to install the FADEC. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200 APU - START C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque Wrench To torque the bolts available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to the rear electronic compart- Ladder 1 available ment F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the protective plugs and caps from connectors. (2) Put the FADEC (2) in its position. (3) Install the screw (3) and washers (4). Tighten the screw (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-64-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Connect the electrical connectors (1) to the FADEC. NOTE: Make sure there is a minimum of 10 minutes after the FADEC is powered to synchronize the FADEC and DMM, before you make APU start or Smart Terminal communications attempts. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close rear electronic compartment access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), and remove the ladder. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the “APU Control” circuit breaker. (3) Operate the APU ( AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200) if applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-64-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
